member.name: IThumbnailHandlerFactory.GetThumbnailHandler
member.summary: Gets the requested thumbnail handler for the thumbnail of a given item.
member.param: The item within the namespace for which the thumbnail handler is being retrieved.
A pointer to an to be used during the moniker binding operation of this process.
A reference to the IID of the interface requested. This is usually or .
When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to the requested thumbnail handler. If this method fails, this value is NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IThumbnailHandlerFactory
member.summary: Exposes a method for retrieving the thumbnail handler of an item. Implement this interface if you want to specify what extractor is used for a child IDList.
